item.title: [Announcement] Warning about a fundamental issue on FreeDi
item.description:
Hello everyone!
There are currently a few reports about affected X3 series owners with freezing systems mid print. (See here https://github.com/Phil1988/FreeDi/issues/288).
I didnt had that problem on my tests before releasing v2.00 on my X-Max3 - but there definetly is "something" not working for some users. Unfortunately I am gone for a while (see https://github.com/Phil1988/FreeDi/issues/283) and I cant track this down.
